document.masterDocTitle: An annotated checklist of the chondrichthyans of Papua New Guinea

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated checklist of the chondrichthyans of Papua New Guinea

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Dasyatis annotatus
Last, 1987 : 57
, Fig. 1 . Holotype: CSIRO T 449. Type locality: Northwest Shelf, Western Australia.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Local synonymy:
Neotrygon
(?) uhlenbergi— Filewood, 1973 : 13 (PNG);
Himantura uylenbergi—
Kailola, 1987 : 29 (west of Daru to Orangerie Bay).
Neotrygon annotata
—Last et al. , 2016a: 584 (southern New Guinea);
White et al. , 2018
: 238, figs (PNG).

Remarks: First recorded from PNG by Filewood (1973) as
Neotrygon
(?) uhlenbergi ; the specific names comes from
Dasybatis uylenburgi Giltay, 1933
, recently considered a junior synonym of
Brevitrygon walga (Müller & Henle, 1841)
. Common in the bycatch of the Gulf of Papua prawn trawl fishery. Probably restricted to the southernmost regions of Papua , from Orangerie Bay westwards.
